claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

new_evidence.quote: Flublok is standardized according to United States Public Health Service (USPHS) requirements. For the 2024-2025 influenza season it is formulated to contain 135 mcg HA per 0.5 mL dose, with 45 mcg HA of each of the following 3 influenza virus strains: A/West Virginia 30 2022 (A/Wisconsin/67/2022 pdm 09 like virus) (H1 N1), A/Massachusetts/18/ 2022 (H3 N2) and B/Austria/1359417/2021.
new_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote specifies that Flublok is formulated to contain hemagglutinin (HA) from the exact strains selected for the 2024-2025 influenza season, which are determined by WHO and FDA recommendations, supporting the claim of an identical antigenic match.

new_evidence.quote: Flublok contains recombinant HA proteins of the three strains of influenza virus specified by health authorities for inclusion in the annual seasonal vaccine.
new_evidence.relevance_explanation: This statement directly affirms that Flublok uses the exact strains specified by health authorities (WHO and FDA) for the annual flu vaccine, supporting the claim of identical antigenic match.
